mapper.select: select qna.qnaNum, qna.userEmail, users.userNick, qna.qnaTitle, qna.qnaContent, qna.qnaDate, qna.qnaDept, qna.qnaPNum, qna.qnaNotice, qna.qnaSecret, qna.qnaPos from qna join users on qna.userEmail = users.userEmail order by qna.qnaNotice desc,qna.qnaPNum desc, qna.qnaNum

select qna.qnaNum, qna.userEmail, users.userNick, qna.qnaTitle, qna.qnaContent, qna.qnaDate, qna.qnaDept, qna.qnaPNum, qna.qnaNotice, qna.qnaSecret, qna.qnaPos from qna join users on qna.userEmail = users.userEmail where qna.qnaNum=#{qnaNum}

mapper.select: select users.userPhoto, users.userNick,comm.qnaCommNum,comm.qnaNum,comm.userEmail,comm.qnaCommContent,comm.qnaCommDate,comm.qnaCommDept,comm.qnaCommPNum,comm.qnaCommPos from qnacomm comm join users on comm.userEmail = users.userEmail where comm.qnaNum=#{qnaNum} order by comm.qnaCommPNum desc , comm.qnaCommNum
mapper.update: update qnaComm set qnaCommPNum=#{num} where qnaCommNum=#{num}
